description:
Classic 10-point crampon for mountaineers, skiers, and hikers. The sharp front points are good on steeper, more technical terrain. These have been updated with a lighter weight, stainless steel construction to resist corrosion.

  • Made of stainless steel with nylon strap system
  • Rapid-adjustment mechanism eliminates the screw adjustment
  • Flat, horizontal rails for more stability and less snowballing
  • 2 smaller points behind secondary points for stability
  • Stiff lanyard construction is easy to enter, but a bit bulky
  • Strap system will accommodate all boots, even those without welts
  • Includes antibot. (Replacements also available)
name: Black Diamond Contact Stainless Steel Crampons
